headline: Dollar Tree, Inc. (DLTR): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Dollar Tree, Inc. on MBI Deep Dives’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on DLTR. Dollar Tree, Inc.’s share was trading at $130.41 as of February 23rd. DLTR’s trailing and forward P/E were 17.49 and 14.18 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
